amendment.description: Amendment limits to 35 percent the percentage of households nationwide that may be reached by TV stations directly owned by a single network or ownership group.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in House Report 104-223 as amendment No. 2-5, to limit to 35% the percentage of households nationwide that may be reached by TV stations directly owned by a single network or ownership group.
